original_title: I Have A Picture: Film No. 1001 in the Life of the oldest Extra in the world
overview: Through the interactions between two film directors and a longtime film extra, this documentary questions the distinction between real and fake. A game of power between assistant director and director leads to the realisation that we all live our lives as extras, ‘accessories’ in the background who wait for the chance to become a star.
title: I Have A Picture: Film No. 1001 in the Life of the oldest Extra in the world
